member_organisations: The list of member organizations of Estonian Social Enterprise Network: https://sev.ee/meie-liikmed/
fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Taxation, Regional Policy
eu_initiatives:
1) Social Business Initiative and its sub-initiatives. 
2) Public Procurement Reform, including implementation of the Directives.
organisation_name: MTÜ Sotsiaalsete Ettevõtete Võrgustik (Estonian Social Enterprise Network) (SEV)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: We are a member of the Network of Estonian Nonprofit Organizations. The list of members: http://heakodanik.ee/emsli-liikmete-nimekiri/
goals__remit: The Estonian Social Enterprise Network´s strategic objectives are concerned with increasing the number, capacity and impact of social enterprises in Estonia. We are both a membership-based association and an advocacy think tank. Currently, we have 51 of the top Estonian social enterprises as our members, with the number of members is growing steadily. As an advocate representing the social enterprise sector, we have become an officially recognized partner for the Ministries of Interior, Social Affairs, and Finance.
